code: @Override @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     createApplicationContext(). }

@Override protected AbstractXmlApplicationContext createApplicationContext() {     AbstractXmlApplicationContext answer.     try {         answer = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("org/apache/camel/spring/config/SpringRouteNoOutputTest.xml").         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (RuntimeCamelException e) {         IllegalArgumentException iae = assertIsInstanceOf(IllegalArgumentException.class, e.getCause()).         assertEquals("Route myRoute has no outputs: Route(myRoute)[[From[direct:start]] -> []]", iae.getMessage()).         return null.     }     return answer. }
